name: Bus Drive Snow Simulator
description:
The deep snow in the winters has made it difficult for people to move around and tourists are also planning skiing trips and you have to transport the passengers and ski gear to offroad deep snow mountain tracks. Drive the snow tourist bus and pick n drop the passengers

Features
• Real snow tourist bus driving experience
• Explore city and hilly offroad environments with heavy snow
• Real snow fall simulated driving
• Smooth controls, accelaration and braking
• Amazing 3D graphics and sounds
